name: Monster (itch) (RunandFun)
description:
You play as a young child who is awoken by strange sounds coming from out side of their window.

Recommended that you play in full screen.

Main story :OMGALLCAPS https://twitter.com/Ceadmileailt

Story help, main tester and typo finder: Grip https://twitter.com/voidnuwull

Art:Mundane https://twitter.com/MundanePixel

The chosen one:Tortilla

Check out Mundane's awesome game he made for the same jam here!:https://mundanepixel.itch.io/the-fog
